content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Atlético de Madrid 0.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Atlético de Madrid 0.
Foul by Óscar Díaz (Almería).
Miranda (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Almería. Óscar Díaz replaces Jonathan.
Attempt blocked. Javier Manquillo (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Ángel Trujillo.
Substitution, Almería. Corona replaces Suso.
Goal!  Almería 2, Atlético de Madrid 0. Verza (Almería) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
Daniel Aranzubia (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the red card.
Penalty conceded by Daniel Aranzubia (Atlético de Madrid) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Almería. Jonathan draws a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Daniel Aranzubia.
Attempt saved. Aleix Vidal (Almería) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jonathan.
Arda Turan (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Rafita (Almería).
Goal!  Almería 1, Atlético de Madrid 0. Verza (Almería) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left to the top right corner. Assisted by Suso following a corner.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Javier Manquillo.
Attempt blocked. Aleix Vidal (Almería) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is blocked. Assisted by Sebastián Dubarbier.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Adrián López replaces Raul García.
Aleix Vidal (Almería) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Sebastián Dubarbier following a fast break.
